DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess comfort OPTI-FREE RepleniSH soft contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Subjective Comfort With Multipurpose Care Solutions Soft Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Currently wear silicone hydrogel contact lenses daily wear basis ; Currently use OPTIFREE RepleniSH contact lens solution ; Generally healthy ; Normal ocular health ; Willing follow study procedure visit schedule ; Sign Informed Consent privacy document ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Use additional lens cleaner ; Known sensitivities ingredient either test article ; Systemic ocular disease disorder would negatively affect conduct outcome study ; History ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month ; Any topical ocular systemic antibiotic within 7 day enrollment continue throughout study ; Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollent ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
